attributes.action:
No Means No:
Say "No" to the EU.
Say "No" to the war, which causes immigration
attributes.additional_details: No to EU dictation of British civil/military decisions. No to the war that forces millions to immigrate, relocate or otherwise remain under the constant threat of attack. No to charities, organisations, corporations, governments and people that fund extremism. No to airstrikes on the civilian population of the Middle East. We cannot be manipulated by threats on foreign/domestic soil or propaganda. It our duty to end violence & exploitation to make the Middle East more habitable for its citizens.
attributes.background: It is our responsibility to protect the global community we created. Hundreds of immigrants are relocated, since we refuse to end the war in one fluid movement. We have to be prepared to back up, saying "No" with an equal measure of strength. No to perpetuating the EU, immigration and war any longer
